reviewText: The videos are well done and shows how to cut different hair styles. But there are no explanations so you have to be very perceptive because the professional stylist makes it look easy.

Awesome DVDs!! Very informative and very helpful!! It gives you the fundamentals of haircutting. If you are serious about cutting get this DVD.This is a must have for hairdressers who are looking to perfect their precision hair cuts This DVDs come highly recommended from professionals in the industry and from my personal knowledge gain from the DVDs.  Very Easy to follow and I am a visual learner.
